label.phrase: involvement in theater develops important skills of communications and presence

clusterList.phrase: involvement in theater develops important skills of communications and presence
we call it stage presence but it is also personal presence it is the bearing and attitude that develops from public performance it produces interpersonal openness that enhances communications
different way to talk to a young audience
more expertise in the audience than there possibly could be on stage
what is most important for actors is that they have a quiet place to study their roles and access to a kitchen to store groceries and prepare meals
